name: Path of the Gods
description:
Path of the Gods is a top-down prototype for my portfolio. It's an action game that the objective is to defeat the minions and in the end, the boss, to be a god.

      This project has the objective to show my programming experience and practice, but obviously that you will have a little time of fun with this game.

      If you're interested, come on and play it and, please, give me some comments about what do you think that I need to improve. Your feedback is so much important.

Thank you and have fun!
